content: >this pattern is available for downloading also on payhip 1 with a pay what you want option kanteletar sock pattern is the closing sequel to my trilogy of traditional sock patterns including also echoes from karelia 2 and sydämeni laulu 3 it was the pattern of tour-de-sock 2017 stage 2 **pattern features ** - knitted cuff down - instructions written for magic loop but dpns can be used as well - instructions written in metric and us terminology - four sizes small 60 sts medium 66 sts large 72 sts and extra-large 80 sts - folded cuff latvian braids stranded colourwork slipped stitches and a heel back gusset with a heel flap under the heel - charts but no written instructions for the stranded colourwork 1 https //payhip com/b/6yefp 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/echoes-from-karelia 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/sydameni-laulu
